ModMetaData.name: Yamato Main Gun大和炮
ModMetaData.author: Wolixixi/XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Type-94 46cm Gun Main Turret.
Cannon One/Two/Three - Triple-Mount Type-94 - 45-fold/460mm caliber naval gun. Includes multiple ammunition types.
Requires VFE Security - used for bombardment mechanic.
Translated by XxHyde840xX
